casebody.data:
PACHAS
v.
NC DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH & HUMAN SERVICES 144A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 22, 2018 Ms. Madison Anne Hardee, Attorney at Law, for Pachas, Julissa (Administrator) Mr. Lee Joseph Miller, Attorney at Law, for NC Department of Health And Human Services Mr. Douglas S. Sea, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, for Pachas, Julissa (Administrator) Ms. Cassidy Estes-Rogers, Attorney at Law, for Pachas, Julissa (Administrator) Mr. John R. Rittelmeyer, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for Disability Rights North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of June 2018 by Disability Rights of North Carolina for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of June 2018."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
